Câu hỏi: Q1. ________ is the application of machine learning.
Đáp án: Answer: d. All of the above

Câu hỏi: Q2. From the following, _______ is not a feature of K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN).
Lựa chọn A: KNN is simple and pretty intuitive

Câu hỏi: Q3. Which of the following is the main goal of machine learning?
Đáp án: Answer: a. Enable computer to learn data

Câu hỏi: Q4. Choose the real-world application of ML from the following.
Đáp án: Answer: d. All of the above

Câu hỏi: Q5. Which of the following ML algorithms can be used with unlabelled data?
Q6. Machine learning is a subset of _______.
Q7. From the following, choose the successful applications of ML
Lựa chọn C: Learning to drive an autonomous vehicles
Đáp án: Answer: d. All of the above

Câu hỏi: Q8. From the following, ________ is not machine learning.
Q9. Choose a machine learning technique from the following.
Lựa chọn C: Both a and b are correct
Lựa chọn D: Neither a nor b is correct
Đáp án: Answer: b. Genetic programming and induction learning

Câu hỏi: Q10. Which of the following elements defines the Candidate-Elimination algorithm?
Lựa chọn A: Just a set of candidates’ hypothesis
Lựa chọn B: Set of instances, set of candidate hypothesis
Đáp án: Answer: b. Set of instances, set of candidate hypothesis

Câu hỏi: Q11. FIND-S algorithm ignores ______.
Q12. ________ is an example of stacking.
Q13. ________ is a clustering algorithm in ML.
Q14. Which of the following is the most significant phase in the genetic algorithm?
Q15. Dimensionality reduction reduces in _______.
Q16. _______ model is a generative model used in ML
Q17. Choose the invalid statement for Ensemble voting.
Lựa chọn A: It takes non-linear combinations for learners
Lựa chọn B: It takes linear combinations for learners
Lựa chọn C: It is the easiest way to merge multiple classifiers
Lựa chọn D: It is also called ensembles and linear opinion pools
Đáp án: Answer: a. It takes non-linear combinations for learners

Câu hỏi: Q18. ML comprises learning algorithms that
Đáp án: Answer: d. All of the above

Câu hỏi: Q19. Data points possess negative residual if
Lựa chọn A: The regression lines truly pass through the point
Lựa chọn B: They are above the regression line
Lựa chọn C: They are below the regression line
Đáp án: Answer: c. They are below the regression line

Câu hỏi: Q20. Which of the following models is trained with data only in a single batch?
Đáp án: Answer: c. Both a and b

Câu hỏi: Q21. ______machine learning algorithm is associated with the idea of bagging?

Q23. From the following, choose the evaluation metric commonly used for classification tasks in the presence of class imbalance.
Q24. ________ is not a supervised ML algorithm.
Q25. What do we call an application of machine learning methods to large databases?
Q26. From the following, which is the appropriate definition of neuro software?
Lựa chọn C: An easy and powerful neural network
Đáp án: Answer: c. An easy and powerful neural network

Câu hỏi: Q27. If the ML model output does not include the target variable, the model is called ______.
Q28. _______ is a supervised learning task.
Q29. ______ algorithm is used to identify frequent itemsets in transactional databases.
Q30. Choose a valid statement with respect to bias and variance.
Lựa chọn A: Models that underfit possess a low variance
Lựa chọn B: Models that overfit possess a low bias
Lựa chọn C: Models that underfit possess a high bias
Đáp án: Answer: d. Both a and b
